title: Proposition Event Type
description: A set of direct customer interactions that an end-user might perform when shown a proposition.

xdm:send.title: send
xdm:send.description: Proposition was sent to the client. This does not guarantee the proposition arrived or was displayed to the user.

xdm:trigger.title: trigger
xdm:trigger.description: Proposition was chosen to be displayed by the client SDK. Other factors may prevent it from actually being displayed.

xdm:display.title: display
xdm:display.description: Proposition was displayed to the user.

xdm:interact.title: interact
xdm:interact.description: User interacted with the proposition, usually in a positive way.

xdm:dismiss.title: dismiss
xdm:dismiss.description: User dismissed or rejected the proposition without any other direct interaction.

xdm:unsubscribe.title: unsubscribe
xdm:unsubscribe.description: User has requested to not be shown the proposition in the future.
